about_the_game:
Hi there!



I'm a demon named Lilith. I used to haunt books, oujia boards, and telephone lines, but now I spend my time traveling the internet, looking for people like you.

Why don't you come visit? Together we can.. 

  • Take a thoughtful, engaging, personality test 
  • Use that test to find the value of your soul, in dollars (I made a nice certificate!)
  • Discuss demon lore (though I'm really an imp)

I promise it'll be ten minutes of questions and fun!  

I mean, it's not like I really want you to talk to me or anything like that... but if you just happened to want to speak to me, someone who definitely isn't lonely, then I think that could be nice.

Got it?  Then let's begin.

Warning: this visual novel may contain dark themes.
detailed_description:
Hi there!



I'm a demon named Lilith. I used to haunt books, oujia boards, and telephone lines, but now I spend my time traveling the internet, looking for people like you.

Why don't you come visit? Together we can.. 

  • Take a thoughtful, engaging, personality test 
  • Use that test to find the value of your soul, in dollars (I made a nice certificate!)
  • Discuss demon lore (though I'm really an imp)

I promise it'll be ten minutes of questions and fun!  

I mean, it's not like I really want you to talk to me or anything like that... but if you just happened to want to speak to me, someone who definitely isn't lonely, then I think that could be nice.

Got it?  Then let's begin.

Warning: this visual novel may contain dark themes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take a personality test with a definitely-not-clingy demon girl.
